subject: Guillain-Barre Syndrome
Football
Heisman Trophy
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Danny Wuerffel, a quarterback won the 1996 Heisman while playing for Florida, contracted Guillain-Barré syndrome, a disorder in which the body’s immune system attacks the nerves.
snippet: Danny Wuerffel, a quarterback won the 1996 Heisman while playing for Florida, contracted Guillain-Barré syndrome, a disorder in which the body’s immune system attacks the nerves.
